mapper.sql: a.asset_no, a.site_id, a.assigned_name, a.asset_type, a.item_no, a.srl_no, a.fa_no, a.qty, a.ap_amount, a.ap_date, a.fa_date, a.unload_qty, a.scrp_date, a.scrp_order_no, a.cr_user, a.cr_time, a.md_user, a.md_time, a.location_id, a.site_id wh_id, g.bts_site_id wh_name, b.tag_no, e.mat_no, e.mat_name, i.name mat_status_dscr, c.maint_dept dept_id, d.dept_name, d.domain, h.name domain_name, case when b.tag_no is not null then b.ven_sn end ven_sn, e.catg1_code, f.catg1_name, e.catg2_code, f.catg2_name, e.catg3_code, f.catg3_name
mapper.select:
select
distinct
from TB_INV_ASSET a inner join TB_INV_SRL b on b.srl_no = a.srl_no and b.site_id = a.site_id left join TB_SITE_LOCATION c on c.location_id = a.location_id left join TB_ORG_DEPT d on d.dept_id = c.maint_dept left join TB_INV_MATERIAL e on e.mat_no = a.item_no left join TB_INV_CATEGORY f on f.catg1_code = e.catg1_code and f.catg2_code = e.catg2_code and f.catg3_code = e.catg3_code left join TB_SITE_MAIN g on g.site_id = a.site_id left join TB_ORG_DOMAIN h on h.id = d.domain left join TB_SYS_LOOKUP i on i.type = 'MAT_STATUS' and i.code = '1'
order by ${orderByClause}

select
from TB_INV_ASSET a inner join TB_INV_SRL b on b.srl_no = a.srl_no inner join TB_SITE_LOCATION c on c.location_id = a.location_id inner join TB_ORG_DEPT d on d.dept_id = c.maint_dept left join TB_INV_MATERIAL e on e.mat_no = a.item_no left join TB_INV_CATEGORY f on f.catg1_code = e.catg1_code and f.catg2_code = e.catg2_code and f.catg3_code = e.catg3_code left join TB_SITE_MAIN g on g.site_id = a.site_id left join TB_ORG_DOMAIN h on h.id = d.domain left join TB_SYS_LOOKUP i on i.type = 'MAT_STATUS' and i.code = '1' where a.asset_no = #{asset_no,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.insert: insert into TB_INV_ASSET (asset_no, site_id, assigned_name, asset_type, item_no, srl_no, fa_no, qty, ap_amount, ap_date, fa_date, unload_qty, scrp_date, scrp_order_no, cr_user, cr_time, md_user, md_time, location_id) values (#{asset_no,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{site_id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{assigned_name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{asset_type,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{item_no,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{srl_no,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{fa_no,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{qty,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{ap_amount,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, #{ap_date,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{fa_date,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{unload_qty,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{scrp_date,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{scrp_order_no,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{cr_user,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{cr_time,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{md_user,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{md_time,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{location_id,jdbcType=VARCHAR})

insert into TB_INV_ASSET
asset_no,
site_id,
assigned_name,
asset_type,
item_no,
srl_no,
fa_no,
qty,
ap_amount,
ap_date,
fa_date,
unload_qty,
scrp_date,
scrp_order_no,
cr_user,
cr_time,
md_user,
md_time,
location_id,

mapper.update:
update TB_INV_ASSET a
asset_no = #{record.asset_no,jdbcType=BIGINT},
site_id = #{record.site_id,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
assigned_name = #{record.assigned_name,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
asset_type = #{record.asset_type,jdbcType=CHAR},
item_no = #{record.item_no,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
srl_no = #{record.srl_no,jdbcType=BIGINT},
fa_no = #{record.fa_no,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
qty = #{record.qty,jdbcType=INTEGER},
ap_amount = #{record.ap_amount,jdbcType=NUMERIC},
ap_date = #{record.ap_date,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
fa_date = #{record.fa_date,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
unload_qty = #{record.unload_qty,jdbcType=INTEGER},
scrp_date = #{record.scrp_date,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
scrp_order_no = #{record.scrp_order_no,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
cr_user = #{record.cr_user,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
cr_time = #{record.cr_time,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
md_user = #{record.md_user,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
md_time = #{record.md_time,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
location_id = #{record.location_id,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

update TB_INV_ASSET a set asset_no = #{record.asset_no,jdbcType=BIGINT}, site_id = #{record.site_id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, assigned_name = #{record.assigned_name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, asset_type = #{record.asset_type,jdbcType=CHAR}, item_no = #{record.item_no,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, srl_no = #{record.srl_no,jdbcType=BIGINT}, fa_no = #{record.fa_no,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, qty = #{record.qty,jdbcType=INTEGER}, ap_amount = #{record.ap_amount,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, ap_date = #{record.ap_date,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, fa_date = #{record.fa_date,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, unload_qty = #{record.unload_qty,jdbcType=INTEGER}, scrp_date = #{record.scrp_date,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, scrp_order_no = #{record.scrp_order_no,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, cr_user = #{record.cr_user,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, cr_time = #{record.cr_time,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, md_user = #{record.md_user,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, md_time = #{record.md_time,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, location_id = #{record.location_id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

update TB_INV_ASSET
site_id = #{site_id,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
assigned_name = #{assigned_name,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
asset_type = #{asset_type,jdbcType=CHAR},
item_no = #{item_no,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
srl_no = #{srl_no,jdbcType=BIGINT},
fa_no = #{fa_no,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
qty = #{qty,jdbcType=INTEGER},
ap_amount = #{ap_amount,jdbcType=NUMERIC},
ap_date = #{ap_date,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
fa_date = #{fa_date,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
unload_qty = #{unload_qty,jdbcType=INTEGER},
scrp_date = #{scrp_date,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
scrp_order_no = #{scrp_order_no,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
cr_user = #{cr_user,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
cr_time = #{cr_time,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
md_user = #{md_user,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
md_time = #{md_time,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
location_id = #{location_id,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where asset_no = #{asset_no,jdbcType=BIGINT}

update TB_INV_ASSET set site_id = #{site_id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, assigned_name = #{assigned_name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, asset_type = #{asset_type,jdbcType=CHAR}, item_no = #{item_no,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, srl_no = #{srl_no,jdbcType=BIGINT}, fa_no = #{fa_no,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, qty = #{qty,jdbcType=INTEGER}, ap_amount = #{ap_amount,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, ap_date = #{ap_date,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, fa_date = #{fa_date,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, unload_qty = #{unload_qty,jdbcType=INTEGER}, scrp_date = #{scrp_date,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, scrp_order_no = #{scrp_order_no,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, cr_user = #{cr_user,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, cr_time = #{cr_time,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, md_user = #{md_user,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, md_time = #{md_time,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, location_id = #{location_id,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where asset_no = #{asset_no,jdbcType=BIGINT}

update TB_INV_ASSET
site_id = #{site_id,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
assigned_name = #{assigned_name,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
asset_type = #{asset_type,jdbcType=CHAR},
item_no = #{item_no,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
srl_no = #{srl_no,jdbcType=BIGINT},
fa_no = #{fa_no,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
qty = #{qty,jdbcType=INTEGER},
ap_amount = #{ap_amount,jdbcType=NUMERIC},
ap_date = #{ap_date,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
fa_date = #{fa_date,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
unload_qty = #{unload_qty,jdbcType=INTEGER},
scrp_date = #{scrp_date,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
scrp_order_no = #{scrp_order_no,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
cr_user = #{cr_user,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
cr_time = #{cr_time,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
md_user = #{md_user,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
md_time = #{md_time,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
location_id = #{location_id,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
setup_date = #{setup_date,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
setup_order_no = #{setup_order_no,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
setup_qty = #{setup_qty,jdbcType=INTEGER},
complete_date = #{complete_date,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
where site_id = #{site_id,jdbcType=VARCHAR} And item_no = #{item_no,jdbcType=VARCHAR} And srl_no = #{srl_no,jdbcType=BIGINT} And asset_type = #{asset_type,jdbcType=CHAR}
